message.name: INF_NO_CATEGORIES_AVAILABLE
message.locale: No rule set categories have been created on the system.

message.name: ERR_XFV_NO_PARAMATERS_SPECIFIED
message.locale: One of the parameters must be specified.

message.name: ERR_XRV_RULE_SET_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A rule set with the name "%1s" already exists. Duplicate rule set names are not allowed.

message.name: ERR_XFV_NO_DESCRIPTION_SPECIFIED
message.locale: A display name for the rule set must be specified.
